title: Monkeypox and Orthopoxvirus Mini-Symposium
desc: Discussion of bioinformatic resources and tools available and in development for the purpose of studying monkeypox virus. Will also include a brief primer on monkeypox virus, as well as research presentations focusing on the recent outbreak.

title: PATRIC to BV-BRC Final Transition Schedule
desc: We are now in the final phase of transitioning PATRIC to the Bacterial and Viral Bioinformatics Resource Center (BV-BRC). Website redirects will start in mid-September, and PATRIC will go offline by mid-December of this year. Here is what you need to know.

title: Ticks and Tick-Borne Pathogens Webinar Series
desc: This webinar series is geared towards researchers working on ticks and the bacterial, viral or eukaryotic pathogens they transmit.

title: Introduction to BV-BRC Webinar Series
desc: As part of the launch of the new BV-BRC Beta website, we are offering a webinar series to help new users, as well as PATRIC and IRD/ViPR users, become acquainted with the new website.
